website_summaries.verdict: The high price can be a deal-breaker, but if you can find it at a discount, it will provide commercial-grade service at a personal water cooler price point.
pros: Is ADA compliant, an important consideration for publicly accessible buildings
A great replacement for older, non-compliant water coolers
cons: Unit must be installed according to ADA regulations, which may require additional parts and professional installation

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. Except it is ONLY designed for installs where the electrical receptive is on the wall INSIDE the frame of the fountain cabinet. This was a replacement in my case, and my receptive was about 6 inches outside the cabinet. I had to just drop the cable between the metal frame and the drywall and it's kind of smashed. It would have been so simple for the manufacturer tojustcut a little divot out of the frame to allow room for the wire...but oh well. it works.
customer_reviews.author: Customer #42A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: No parts were included for installation, didn’t even know parts were needed. Would have been nice if seller could have mentioned this in description..... instead I spent all day figuring out what parts were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tauna Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Used as an outdoor fountain, works great
customer_reviews.text: We operate a small school for children. We had a refrigerated outdoor fountain that died on us and replaced it with this. So far it's been working like a champ (6 months). Water keeps cool, the machine is quiet, and looks spiffy. Our summers get up to 120 degrees here, so that'll be the ultimate test to see if this thing can hang. I'll update if it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbox

customer_reviews.title: rough-in carefully
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and the unit works as expected. My contractor wanted to charge me $1000 to provide a WF and hook it up. Follow the rough-in plumbing as close as possible. The area where the plumbing comes through the back of the machine is limited. Otherwise, installation was a snap. Saved $700
customer_reviews.author: Susan Paoletta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace on that died. It works great! We had to spend extra time because the power, water supply & drain didn't exactly line up with our former unit but the mount did & it made the rest seem easier. Saved a significant amount over quotes we received.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Poor control valve design/parts on replacement valve.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for several years, had to replace the control valve. Every one we got leaked thru the flow adjuster. So we installed a pressure regulator per there support desk. Still leaked. Plastic parts are not good for this application.
customer_reviews.author: RSF

customer_reviews.title: Bought for church
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the old free-standing water fountain in our church fellowship hall. Works great and the kids no longer need a step-stool to get a drink
customer_reviews.author: Joe Durning

customer_reviews.title: Motor loud
customer_reviews.text: The motor in this item was so loud that it disturbed our meeting. We called the manufacture and was told its normal. Called again and they said the motor has been replaced in the newer item. We ordered a kit to replace the defective motor and the cost was $80. poor customer support and not standing behind what they make- Elkay
customer_reviews.author: Len Y

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Hard install if your not handy
customer_reviews.text: Good price as compared to box stores. But you need to be fairly handy to install. Especially if this is replacing an old unit. You will need to modify the drain and feed line.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: It works good
customer_reviews.text: Made of very thin material. Needed to put extra screws on the fountain for more sturdiness. It works very well though.
customer_reviews.author: SamBoudreaux

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: suffered some internal damage in shipping requiring disassembly and repair to adjust flow but otherwise good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Phil McCalley

customer_reviews.title: Elaky to replave Oasis Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace church's nonfunctional Oasis water cooler. It was going to cost more to fix the old one then to replace with this brand new cooler. It was very easy to install, and worked very well. The water inlet is 3/8 OD copper tubing. Very easy to hook up. And the water filter is very easy to change. The one we replaced was a pain. It looks as if maintenance on this machine will be so much easier. Fast cool down time too. Overall, the church was pleased and was a very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for hundreds less! I bought this to replace a 40 year old GE and was a bit apprehensive about the rough in placement of the plumbing. A few trips to the Depot and a little cutting with a 4 inch cut off wheel and the install was complete in 3 hours (could be much faster if the pipeing lined up)! As with all refrigeration if the coil is not kept clean the compressor will go bad. In my application the unit should last a long time as it doesn't get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drinking Fountain
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our garage in our home and we love it! We had a plumber friend install and my hubby is an electrician so he ran the electrical, so for us it was easy! You can change how far it shoots out and the temperature and that is super simple to do!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Wall mounted fountain.
customer_reviews.text: A great value. It was easily installed and peformed flawlessly after being mounted and plumbed.
customer_reviews.author: William Watts

customer_reviews.title: Could be include all parts ....
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I gave 3 starts it’s because we had to buy a piece to get that installed in my gym and for the price we pay I think would be fair if everything was include . But otherwise it works really good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcely foggi

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Do-It-Yourself.
customer_reviews.text: The difficulty in installing the fountain was not having the proper alignment with the pipes. We were replacing the unit and had to cut new holes. The fountain is working just fine and looks nice on the wall at our church.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybee

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u set aside at least 2 hours for ur installation
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Replacement of one that our church had for over 25 years. Downside u have to use plastic flex pipe for the water connection and has very limited space to work and get the water connection connected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good water fountains
customer_reviews.text: mounting was easy , functions very well easy to adjust ,looks great no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Dan Drew

customer_reviews.title: Saved a bundle
customer_reviews.text: Had all plumbing and electric installed during construction of building with plans to add a cooler at later date. Local plumber wanted $615 to install one just like this one.
customer_reviews.author: MrFixIt

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on the wall, and was fairly easy to install. You do need to be somewhat handy to put this in, but if you can do it then this is a great product. The best part (by far) was the price. I got it for about 1/2 of what I was finding it for from building supply companies. I have no idea why, as it works great now that it's installed. Very quiet, and the water is nice and cold. Shipped pretty quickly as well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sargentrock

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for the foyer of our church, after almost spending way too much on another brand. It is perfect for our purpose. It is plain enough to blend in to the background, but still has clean styling. Other reviewers noted that it was noisy, but it is no noisier than our previous model, and not a problem for us. Plus, the noise only lasts for a few seconds. We are completely happy with the timeliness of shipping and the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeani T.

customer_reviews.title: work great, reliable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Much less money than the plumbing supply places, work great, reliable and durable. I now have three of these and plan to replace my remaining unreliable, more expensive name brand units.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Phil

customer_reviews.title: Above
customer_reviews.text: Just replace the screws on the bottom to philips screws
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: This works well bought it for my mother’s church and it has served it’s purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: This product has not worked properly since we got it. Now the compressor is so hot it will burn you when you touch the top of it. We can find no one locally who works on them. Really leaves us in a dilema as this is used at our church. I don't know any other way to contact you. Please respond!
customer_reviews.author: Joel G. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to hook up where another elkay was prior
customer_reviews.author: Tar

customer_reviews.title: The bottom panel is difficult to remove and reinstall. ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom panel is difficult to remove and reinstall. If the drain connections are below the unit you need to drill a 1-1/2" hole to run the drain pipe. The directions show a flow adjustment under the flow tap but it was missing on the two unit I purchased and I had to take the panel back off and found the regulator on the other side. I think the design is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Glowth

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time ,as described and was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Rafael LG

customer_reviews.title: Better for new construction than replacement
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit but could be better for replacement or retrofit situations. Access thru the rear to the water and drain lines is limited. The power cord can't be run through the bottom of the unit. Otherwise it's relatively easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Murphree

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our church
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our church. Pretty easy to install as well. The buttons on the side are helpful and easier to use then ones with a button on the spout. It does seem to be a smaller fountain-which is nice because it doesn't take up as much room and still does the job. Best priced and shipped quick.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fountain broken upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: So I opened this up to take out of the box and it is trashed - great fountain. Need to return and get replacement
customer_reviews.author: BigLongman

customer_reviews.title: Fresh water all time
customer_reviews.text: Love it broughtvit for our shop my employee has fresh cold water at all time
customer_reviews.author: Cucaworld

customer_reviews.title: Worked as it should
customer_reviews.text: faster shipping then than thought. perfect match to what we had. worked great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bradfield

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The only part that is stainless steel is the tray where the water falls into. The sides and even the cover to the water spout are all plastic. Although the frame was secure to the wall, you could easily shake the unit.
customer_reviews.author: MDerby

customer_reviews.title: A nice upgrade to the older model.
customer_reviews.text: Since it turned out to be rather larger than its older brother that it replaced, mounting was different and plumbing was a bit problematic. Still, with two of us novices working we had it working exactly as it should and everyone is happy with its easy operation and "no splash" stream.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos D. Pinkstaff

customer_reviews.title: Replaced 1980's WF
customer_reviews.text: The plumbing and electrical was already trimmed out for this, I did have to cut a little on the back flashing, but the unit works great. We have a busy clinic. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Affricate

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I have used a number of these drinking and they are of good quality and seem to work well
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my church which are replacing the old ones of the same brand. The new ones seem to be more compact and have a sleeker appearance, quality wise it is atleast as good if not better and easy to install and hook up. Its definitely a good fit for our church.
customer_reviews.author: Jansen Foster

customer_reviews.title: Smaller over all footprint.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 20YO unit in church hall. Didn't fit old pattern and had to patch old holds. This unit is only 20" H so the unit now sits 16" lower to the ground do to plumbing. At least the kids won't need a stool. I'M OK with that.
customer_reviews.author: p furniss

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Guys! At first I read a review that they did not come with mounting bracket but they do! Will purchase again on next project next month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Water fountain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fountain to put in our employee's breakroom. It was a very simple installation (took about 30 mins) and so far a big hit with our employees. It cools the water effeciently, not too loud, and doesn't produce a whole lot of heat. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Fit right in the old ez8 hole, no problem 20 minute installation
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Robey

customer_reviews.title: Cold water
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to install. Cold water! Fan is a little loud but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Water Cooler replacement
customer_reviews.text: Cooler received was pretty close to the defective one, just about 20 years newer. Mount was a little different from the old one but an easy work around. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Providing ice cold water on warm sunny days!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and we had it installed. Now delivering ice cold water by the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement
customer_reviews.text: Our custodian was able to install with little difficulty. It was replacing a system that had been there for nearly 50 years! The plumbing had to be adjusted but now the whole thing works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: School Secretary

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition and the install was fairly painless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old water fountain that quit cooling. Arrived in good condition and the install was fairly painless.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon E

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good value!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money -- installed in the office and works like a champ. See this model often in commercial establishments (e.g., Publix).
customer_reviews.author: WJS

customer_reviews.title: we found out the compressor was bad and didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Once our building maintenance dept had time time install, we found out the compressor was bad and didn't work. It was past the alotted return item time so we can't exchange the fountain. Now we have an installed water fountain that does not have cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best price
customer_reviews.text: by far the best price for a high quality item. This item was priced locally over 900 bucks delivered prompt and without hassle recommend buying again if needed
customer_reviews.author: k becker

customer_reviews.title: Great water fountain
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this water fountain for our gym and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Herriott

customer_reviews.title: The first one I bought did not work but I ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought did not work but I sent it back and they sent me another one. I had no problems sending it back. The second one works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Lawrimore

customer_reviews.title: Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Every think came as ordered. But we are having trouble with the the unit working all the time. The repairman was there and is ordering the par to fixed the unit. We are to pay nothing to repair
customer_reviews.author: RHHARP

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Installed today. Works great so far. Layout for all mechanicals are important and critical. Nice for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: TackleBerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Fixture
customer_reviews.text: Was the exact replacement for the one we had which was about 20 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Daddeo

customer_reviews.title: NOT a good water fountain = A $400 water faucet
customer_reviews.text: NOT a good water fountain = A $400 water faucet. Cold water for about 5 seconds and then goes to cool water. This unit replaced a 20 year old fountain that would literally put out ICE COLD water. I have tried 2 of these fountains. The first one I returned to Amazon as a defect and they sent another. The second one might have a second more of cold water. Yes, it is adjusted as cold as it will go. Not a good product and I DO NOT recommend you to buy. Very unhappy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The fountain works fine but one of the screws used to attach cover ...
customer_reviews.text: The fountain works fine but one of the screws used to attach cover was a mismatch. It worked and not visible so no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of loud and doesn't feel sturdy. Installed on 2x10 braces.
customer_reviews.author: VistaGlenn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than older models
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a older Elkay fountain, thought it would mount up easier. Had to cut the bottom for drain and also you have to solder water line.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement Cooler for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Finished installation at my church yesterday. Plumbing not too difficult even for a rookie plumber. Water cooled very quickly after we plugged it in. Can't wait too see congregations reaction on Sunday.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Does a great cool job
customer_reviews.text: The Elkay EZS8L water cooler does a great job of keeping water cool. Very easy to install. I was really pleased with the way this unit was packaged and shipped. I recomend this unit to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old water fountain with this. It was easy to install. Had to put it a little lower for handicap. Had to make some modifications to fit proper. Well money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great wall unit for water dispensing for employees to access. Easy install, keeps water cool. Great investment. Would recommend purchasing this unit for plants who have a need for water units.
customer_reviews.author: riz

customer_reviews.title: easy install, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Water fountains met all our expectations, fast del. easy install, quality product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 of these and none of them worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit! Just as described and ready to go. Can't wait to get it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Ginter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It replaced an old unit in our church.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Fountain that's easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: You'll love the water fountain. It was easy to install, mounts flush against the wall, and matches any decor
customer_reviews.author: Kevin dickerson

customer_reviews.title: JUST LIKE DOWNTOWN
customer_reviews.text: Converted from our "non-chilling" free-standing model to this one that delivers a cold dring at an ADA height, easy installation, good price.
customer_reviews.author: TWJ

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was sub-par
customer_reviews.text: Arrived battered up and damaged. Kept it because it was needed desperately at work.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and price was good.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and everyone like the way it looked and worked.
customer_reviews.author: James Warner

customer_reviews.title: Used at an HOA pool. Heavy usage and keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Used at an HOA pool. Heavy usage and keeps on working.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice water cooler. It fits the needs of my small martial arts school perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I bought for my church and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I bought for my church and it took some reworking to make it fit a previously plumbed and wired location, but we did.
customer_reviews.author: Nevins Smith

customer_reviews.title: I was able to replace existing unit with no trouble.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that I was able to replace the existing unit with no changes to to any existing plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Wynn

customer_reviews.title: ... outdated models and for the price this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our outdated models and for the price this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Forche

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This fountain was a direct replacement for the one we had. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: installedand looked great turns on but water pours out of a piece on it i would really like a replacement part for it
customer_reviews.author: j_reiche315

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The customers have received the item and is awaiting installation. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Catlyn

customer_reviews.title: ADA Water cooler
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is working well as a replacement for the cooler installed 20+ years ago that had developed multiple leaks. The new cooler is ADA compliant and works well for our church members and visitors in wheelchairs as well as those that are just thirsty. The multiple water start buttons make it easy to operate from any side. I installed the cooler in about 2 hours after removing the old unit.
customer_reviews.author: htmcc

customer_reviews.title: Great price, however they need to test Fountains before selling them.
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and fountain, my reason for low stars is that the cooling fan didn't work and fan motor and the compressor was over heating. I unplugged it and started to spin the fan by hand and plumbers putty started to fall out. There was a whole lot of putty that was jammed above the fan, other than that the Fan and fountain is working fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold water on a hot summer day!
customer_reviews.text: So thankful that it came fast and works Great! Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elkkay Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: replaces an old floor model. Was easily installed . Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Mystery Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not an exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and was bought as a replacement for a unit that looks exactly the same that had failed. You would think that it would hook right up where then the old one was removed. NO! The only connection that was like the old one was the power plug. I would like to say the new connections were better, but that can't be said. Be prepared to spend sometime redoing water, drain, and mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Moen

customer_reviews.title: Double check the instalation diagram!
customer_reviews.text: The instalation directions had the water outlet shown on the wrong side so when we when to hook it up we had to redo the plumbing to the other side of the drain. After that it went well. It's up and running.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Looks smart
customer_reviews.text: the kids have a great place to drink from now
customer_reviews.author: Larry E Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for church.Easy install,and works good.Very good value.Wish I had bought double unit for adults,and kids.May do that if we can come up with money.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: This is a good value
customer_reviews.text: This service was quick. We found the unit to be easy to install in our church.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have a water cooler
customer_reviews.text: The price. Also, it is being used for our lobby at the church.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement water fountain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 47 year old wall mount water fountain at my church. The old one stopped cooling the water and it was real hard keeping the water arc at a nice height. Elkay fountain works great keeps the water cool and always has a nice water arc when you press any of the push buttons. Only negative was I had to mount it lower then I wanted to because of the power outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Elkay water cooler
customer_reviews.text: The water pressure sometimes changes but overall it works very well. We put this up in our church and it looks good and the water is cold and refreshing every time.
customer_reviews.author: beccaj

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the industry standard and it works with Elkay's ...
customer_reviews.text: As Described. Pretty much the industry standard and it works with Elkay's bottle filling stations.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pech

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. I installed them myself in our Elementary ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I installed them myself in our Elementary School, to replace older and taller Coolers. Experience level required to install: EXPERT!!!
customer_reviews.author: FBPC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had one at work that had a solenoid fail. Cheaper to replace and repair. Simple install.
customer_reviews.author: JM95127

customer_reviews.title: Elkay Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: The Elkay EZS8L ADA Compliant Barrier Free Water Cooler replaced a Halsey Taylor Water Cooler at my Childcare Center. This water cooler was purchased at a lower price on amazon than at other retailers. The Elkay Water Cooler has one major flaw-the spout is so close to the outer edge of the cooler that water spills on the floor when the children drink.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Water Cooler is fine. The first one worked so good we bought a second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Day

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price works good
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price works good, water goes cold to warm and back to cold though, not sure if this is an installation issue or the cooler its self.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy installation. It's been in service for over a year now and still performing like new.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Cocco

customer_reviews.title: Purhased for Church
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Elkay water cooler to replace a cooler that was no longer working, It looks great in the foyer and, so far, it has functioned flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Guest

product_meta.title: Elkay EZS8L Wall Mount ADA Non-Filtered Cooler, 8 GPH, Light Gray Granite
product_meta.description: Color:Light Grey GraniteThe Elkay EZ models are our most popular water cooler series. These models offer easy-touch pushbar or sensor-activated controls and come standard with a Flexi-Guard Safety Bubbler. The extra deep basin minimizes splashing and features an integral drain. Classic design fits well in all building designs.
feature_bullets: Attractive, contemporary design matches modern architecture.
Electronic bubbler push bars for easy activation.
Exclusive fastenerless integrated drain reduces debris accumulation and is easy to clean.
Flexi-Guard bubbler provides a flexible antimicrobial mouth guard to protect against injury and microorganisms.
Vinyl clad finish is durable and attractive.

specifications.Size: 18-3/8 wide x 19-13/16 tall x 19 deep inches
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars352 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
